changes: Modified debug response logic to check user settings before saving responses
Added condition to only save debug responses when strategy is multi-model AND user setting is enabled
Added new switch for 'Model Comparison Mode'
Implemented UI for toggling saveDebugResponses setting
Added descriptive text and warning for the debug mode
Extended AppSettings interface to include saveDebugResponses property
Added documentation for the new setting

patterns_discovered: Conditional feature toggling through user settings
Performance-conscious design with opt-in debug mode
Detailed UI feedback for technical settings
gotchas_discovered: Memory usage increases when debug responses are stored
Debug mode only works with specific multi-model strategies
Need to handle default values for new settings carefully

approach_outcome.implementation_scope: User settings, storage, and UI components
approach_outcome.performance_impact: Optional performance trade-off with debug mode

recommendations: Add telemetry to understand how often users enable Model Comparison Mode
Consider adding a storage size limit for debug responses
Potentially create a separate debug response viewer screen
Implement cleanup mechanism for stored debug responses
